page.title: 17Societies in Wrea Green p.1
page.content: Societies and Clubs in Wrea Green include :- Womens Institute; Flower Club; Mothers Union; R.N.L.I.; N.S.P.C.C.; Dr Barnados; and Wrea Green Players; for adults. For Children there is Tuesday Break; Brownies and Guides. The Womens Institute meets once a month in the school hall - about 50 women attend. The annual subscription is #4.00. At Flower Club flower arrangements are domonstrated by a different person each meeting again in the school hall. The Mothers Union also meets in the school hall to talk and listen to a speaker each month. Wrea Green Players is a Drama club which puts on plays on the school stage. "Toad of Toad Hall"; "Mother Goose" ; "The Pied Piper" to name some
